reviews.review_msg: Little should not be allowed to teach, worest history prof ever!
Painful lectures and tutorials. Does not like undergrad papers. Unapproachable and not necessarily helpful. If your a keener, you'll do well. Do not expect encouragment.

Great prof., definately one of the best. He's extremely knowledgeable and helpful. You'll walk away from the class having improved not only your knowledge of Canadian history, but also yourskills as a historian.Just be prepared to work hard for your mark.
THE WROST PROF I HAVE EVER HAVE!!!!! Too hard and UNAPPROACHABLE!!! I will NEVER take a class with Jack again. Avoid at all costs!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Very interesting and knowledgable in his filed of expertise and at an upper division level he is an excellent teacher and mentor for his students.
